availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Pace. Father of Samantha Pace, Sarah E. Pace, and Margarett C. Pace. Farmer in Magoffin County in 1860. Purchased land from William J. May in Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Unnamed District, p. 19. Find A Grave, "Matthew Pace (1835-1909)," Memorial #922679439, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92679439 (accessed January 31, 2018). KYR-0363-001-0001.
